mapper.select: SELECT score_seq, id, regdate, game_num, set1, set2, set3, set4, set5, set6, set7, set8, set9, set10, strike, spare FROM Score WHERE game_num=#{obj}
SELECT score_seq, id, regdate, game_num, set1, set2, set3, set4, set5, set6, set7, set8, set9, set10, strike, spare FROM Score WHERE game_num=#{game_num} AND id=#{id}
SELECT score_seq, id, regdate, game_num, set1, set2, set3, set4, set5, set6, set7, set8, set9, set10, strike, spare FROM Score WHERE id=#{obj}
SELECT tot_avg, rank_avg FROM(SELECT id, tot_avg, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY tot_avg DESC) AS rank_avg FROM(SELECT id, AVG(set10) AS tot_avg FROM score GROUP BY id)) WHERE id=#{obj}
SELECT strike_avg, strike_rank FROM(SELECT id, strike_avg, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY strike_avg DESC) AS strike_rank FROM(SELECT id, AVG(strike) AS strike_avg FROM score GROUP BY id)) WHERE id=#{obj}
